name: Shreedhar Joshi
college: Shah and Anchor Kutchhi Engineering College

education.school: Shah and Anchor Kutchhi Engineering College

projects.name: Heritage Explorer
projects.description: Revolutionized heritage tourism tech with dynamic features and streamlined access through QR codes, enhancing user engagement and experience.

projects.name: BuzzChat
projects.description: Crafted BuzzChat, a dynamic Full Stack Chatting App with real-time communication, robust security, and a comprehensive suite of features, revolutionizing online interactions.

projects.name: Image Colorization with GAN
projects.description: Engineered a sophisticated Image Colorization model utilizing the UNet architecture, showcasing adeptness in intricate neural network structures. Integrated Conditional GAN (CGAN) and Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) components for heightened colorization accuracy and robust dataset handling.

experiences.description: Developed advanced web applications using the MERN stack, Next.js, and TypeScript, integrating third-party APIs to enhance functionality. Developed and maintained server-side applications using Node.js, and designed and implemented RESTful APIs to enhance backend services. Improved application performance by resolving bugs, maintaining documentation, and utilizing Strapi CMS and Git for efficient development and project management.

Engineered sophisticated machine learning and generative AI models, significantly enhancing predictive analytics and automating content generation. Crafted intuitive and interactive user interfaces, streamlining the deployment and utilization of AI models for diverse user groups.

Directed the development of dynamic websites using the MERN stack, improving overall application efficiency significantly. Spearheaded the integration of impactful features, enhancing user engagement with new functionalities developed using React and Node.js/Express.js. Additionally, streamlined MongoDB databases to optimize application performance and enhance user experience.
